Key: Come now, darling. Let's go on our date.

Say it, Shido. Don't be afraid. You can take on
the Yamai name.
Recommended. Shido should spend time with us.

Shido! How long are you going to make us wait?!
Hurry now and come with me.

Shido. If you pick me, I'll let you do anything.
Leave the other women and be with me.

Ngh... This is getting out of hand.
What do I do?!
(There's only one thing I can do!)

Ahhh! That's right! I just remembered I had to
do something!
What?! What do you have to do, darling?!
Sorry, Miku. I have to go home immediately!

What's this business that is more important than
me?

Origami, I'm so sorry! Everyone, I'm sorry!
I have to get home immediately!

Shido! That means you're going to leave me
behind?
Assumption. Shido is trying to run for it.
W-Wait, Shido!

*Pant, pant*... Home... If I can just get inside,
I'll be safe.
I-I'm so tired... I'm h—
Sh...Shido-saaaan...
Y-Yoshino?! You're here?!

(Yoshino's known for her puppet Yoshinon
on her left hand. She was the next Spirit I met
after Tohka.)

(Normally, she's in the Spirit Mansion next door,
or on the Fraxinus with my sister Kotori, but
there are days she comes by to visit.)
Wh-What's the matter, Yoshino?
*Sniffle*... Eh... Waaa...
Wh-Why are you crying? Tell me.
Um... Um... Shido-san... *sniffle*

(I don't think I can get anything out of her
now... But at times like these...)
Hey, Yoshinon. What happened?
Well, you see, Shido-kun... This is pretty\nbad.

(Just as I suspected. The puppet's mouth
began to move.)

(Yoshino doesn't like to talk to people, so
that's how Yoshinon came about. It's as if
Yoshinon's there to support her.)
So what happened? Did you fall or something?
That's not it, Shido-kun! Nakamura-san...\nNakamura-san passed away from an accident!
Huh? Wait...? Who?
*Sob*... In the drama.
Drama?
That's right. It's a drama called\n'Endless Circle'. Nakamura-san is the main\ncharacter.
Oh, a drama... You scared me.
*Sob*... *sob*... Waaaaaaa...
H-Hey, Yoshino... Don't cry so much...
It's a big deal, Shido-kun! Nakamura-san was\nalmost about to get with Hanako-san! And then\nthis happens... It's horrible!
Yeah, but... I-I didn't even watch that drama...
Naka...Naka...mura-san...

Ahhh. Okay, okay I got it Yoshino. Just
stop crying.
*Sob*... *hiccup*... *Sniffle*...
Wh-What am I to do?
Gosh, Shido-kun, you just don't get it.
What is it, Yoshinon?
Yoshino is very sad right now. If you were her,\nwhat would you want someone to do?
Huh? Um... Leave me alone?
Shut up!
Whoa!
You're totally wrong, Shido-kun! Yoshino\nwants someone to be nice to her and be by\nher side. Get it, Shido-kun?
*Whimper*... *hiccup*

O-Okay, Yoshino. Let's go in for now. We'll
drink warm tea and talk about it. I'll listen to
you until you feel better.
Waaa... Okay, Shido-san... Thank you.
*Sigh*...

(Well... At least Yoshino is feeling better now.
I guess it all worked out.)
